Package net.fabricmc.fabric.api.client.screenhandler.v1

package net.fabricmc.fabric.api.client.screenhandler.v1
API for working with screen handlers on the client.
  • Class
    Description
    ScreenRegistry
    Deprecated.
    Replaced by access wideners for HandledScreens.register(ScreenHandlerType, HandledScreens.Provider) and HandledScreens.Provider in Fabric Transitive Access Wideners (v1).
    ScreenRegistry.Factory<H extends ScreenHandler,S extends Screen & ScreenHandlerProvider<H>>
    A factory for handled screens.
